game.name: Hell Green Blue
game.shortDescription: "Hell Green Blue"은(는) 컬러로 발사되는 블래스터를 무장한 채 지옥의 지하묘지로 모험을 떠나야 하는 2D 액션 어드벤처 퍼즐 게임입니다. 수호자를 이기고, 기술을 향상시키며, 세계를 빨간색의 지배로부터 구해보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Hell Green Blue" is a 2D action-adventure puzzle game where you must venture into the catacombs of hell armed with a blaster that shoots colored projectiles. Defeat the guardians, improve your skills, and save the world from the dominance of the red color!

reviewHighlights.text: A very simple and minimalistic game. You have to shoot at certain colors, gradually advance further and improve your character.
If you're going to improve your reaction rate, then this game is perfect for that!
